name: Oslo Flight Academy
about: Oslo Flight Academy (OFA) is an EASA Approved Training Organisation (NO.ATO.025) and Declared Training Organisation (NO.DTO.0036), offering various modular flight training and theoretical knowledge courses, including PPL, CB-IR(A), ATPL(A), and ATPL(H)/IR. Led by experienced professionals like Ole Martin, with over 15 years in the industry and 6000 flight hours, and Kjersti, with a diverse background in European regulations, OFA ensures the highest degree of safety and compliance. The academy provides comprehensive training programs, including the FAA & EASA Airline Pilot Program in collaboration with Pacific States Aviation, and advanced simulator training on aircraft like the B737NG. With a strong focus on safety and regulatory adherence, OFA prepares students for successful careers as commercial pilots. Contact us to embark on your aviation journey.
